home.name: Nahuel Argañaraz
home.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with solid experience in web application development. I am proficient in programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Java, with experience in execution environments like Node.js, using frameworks such as Express.js and NestJS. I have deep knowledge in relational databases (SQL, including PostgreSQL and MySQL) and in using modern frontend frameworks like React and Redux. I specialize in creating dynamic, efficient, and scalable web applications, with experience working with technologies such as EcmaScript6, Cloudinary, and Firebase. In addition to my technical skills, I highly value teamwork and strive to maintain effective communication, kindness, and empathy. I always aim to maintain a positive attitude when facing challenges and contribute to developing a collaborative environment. My focus is always on learning, improving, and delivering high-quality results for the projects I participate in.
